author: Slidebean
description:
Meta’s new business model: charge the scammers more.

According to Reuters, 10% of Meta’s 2024 revenue is about $16 billion and came from scam or prohibited ads.

Internal documents show Meta didn’t just know about it, they flagged scammers and charged them more.

It’s less “safety enforcement,” more digital mafia:
“You can keep scamming just pay a little extra.”

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Meta reportedly earned $16B from scam ads and let them run.
